features: Ready to Hang: 1 Panel per package, and each panel has 16 Sliver Grommets with 1.6" diameter.

100% Blackout: Double Layers Design, completely keep out the 100% SUNLIGHT and UV RAY. Offer you a real dark environment, perfect for baby room and night shift worker. Absolute privacy with all your indoor activity.

Energy Efficient: Scientific experiments have shown that the white liner reflect light source compared to the black lining, minimize heating & cooling cost by preventing sunlight & draft from getting in.
Elegant Burlap Quality: Linen textured fabric looks modern and more expensive. The perfect color and fabric would work with many different styles.
Easy Care: Machine washable in cold water, use only non-chlorine bleach when needed, tumble dry low and warm iron as needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Double Layers Design Heavy duty make the draperies more durable, burlap effect will bring more vintage and graceful look. Backed with 100% blackout lining, excellent features on full room darkening, thermal insulated, energy saving, noise reducing and privacy protection. High Quality Grommets Top 8 silver metal grommets on 50 inch wide curtain panel, installed already for hanging up; 1.6 inch Inner diameter and 2.4 inch external diameter of each curtain ring, fit for all standard curtain rods. Exquisite Workmanship Good workmanship No loose threads Premium sewing threads and Stitching All seams and hems are aligned

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have owned a pair of these white curtains for several years and have loved them. Now I have purchased a set of gray ones and again I am not disappointed. I love the quality, the linen look and feel, the superior blackout, the ease of hanging them and having them look great immediately, and the durability. I would buy more again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curtain offers total privacy -very pleased with purchase !
reviews.reviewText: Purchased: 100x96 / Color: Naturallocally it was impossible to find curtains which were large enough for our 8ft french doors, these were such a great option. Great quality curtain at a reasonable price.Although the vendor offers many fashionable color choices.... we needed a very neutral color to blend in with existing items. The "natural" color is very similar to a pair of traditional summer linen pants.. the fabric has some texture to it and is NOT shiny at all like many options out there. (blackout liner is creamy off-white- not black)The curtains offer complete privacy when closed - I would say they are medium weight curtains. Not heavy duty/heavy weight curtains to offer extreme temperature insulation... however; for our climate they are more than adequate to knock the chill off the patio doors and block any drafts.As you might imagine they are wrinkled out of the package. We let them hang for a week to ensure we were happy with the purchase of all items (curtains & rods) Using a heavy duty fabric steamer reduced the wrinkles ...... but to make them fully seamless be prepared to iron or take to dry cleaner to have them pressed. I would not hesitate to reorder these curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They look like linen and more expensive than they were. However, the wrinkles do not fall out on their own when hung, I used a steamer which worked well. The backing has a lining that is plastic-like, I would be very careful actually ironing it. Over all, very pleased and the curtain blocks out most of the light and heat without being totally black.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice for black out....
reviews.reviewText: We have lives in our house for 6.5 years and I still hadn’t changed the curtains in our living room from the previous owner! I just couldn’t figure out what color I wanted in order to go with the furniture. I have tan walls and chocolate brown furniture and cherry tables. I wanted something lighter since everything else is so dark. It had to be black out, but I didn’t want something with a pattern/design but I wanted a material with a little texture, like a linen. Our living room window is also a huge picture window so I had a hard time finding panels big enough to cover it without having to buy 3/4 panels. I ordered three different set of drapes because I couldn’t decide. These were the third set I ordered and I love them. They are big enough to cover my window with only two panels and still have some wave to them to look like curtains (the other pair I bought looked like a giant sheet over the window like a college dorm). These definitely are black out and I love that, my living room is so dark at night! The only downside to these is that the lining on the back side sounds like a plastic mattress cover when you open and close them. I don’t mind that much as I open them in the morning and close them in the evening so i don’t have to hear it all day long. I also bought some really pretty linen sheets to go behind them. They look great together. I recommend these curtains for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Drapes for sliding glass door
reviews.reviewText: Installed over new sliding glass door. It blocks the light coming in and also helps keep the heat in. I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Quality Quality!
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this curtain! I bought to put over my sliding door in place of the plastic panel blinds that were in my home before. Not only is the double lining perfect for blocking out light but the fabric elevates my space significantly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large panel at good price
reviews.reviewText: These drapes are a great deal for the size and quality. They are substantial in weight and have a nice neutral look...The natural color was a great choice for my living room.I replaced two panels that I had purchased through a major retailer which were smaller lighter and definitely not blackout as they had been advertised...The Amazon (chinese) supplier was better for sure.The drapes came folded but showed no major wrinkles or lines and I was able to hang them with no ironing.It is hard to even find extra wide panels and when you do they are double the Amazon price.Recommend them highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blocks light, light on your wallet.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the linen blackout curtain from Amazon, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This curtain not only adds a touch of elegance to my space but also provides exceptional light-blocking capabilities, making it a fantastic choice for anyone in need of both style and functionality. It was very wrinkly from the package and needs to be steamed.
I like how heavy they are and the quality is excellent.
Does an excellent job of keeping out the light.
